attributes.action: Bring back workhouses as an alternative to prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More & more often prisoners & ex prisoners are re-offending, due to this prisons are way over crowded, maybe if they didn't have such an esay time in jail they'd think twice about re-offending. 
Workhouses where people have to do a very hard days work for their bed & food would do the trick in my opinion, so heres a petition to bring them back espescially for those re-offenders
